LTE.JO.summary: Lighthouse Capital Limited invests in direct property, and listed real estate and infrastructure securities. Its property portfolio includes retail, logistics, industrial, warehousing, and office properties in Australia, Canada, Hong Kong, Singapore, the United Kingdom, Europe, and the United States. The company was formerly known as Greenbay Properties Ltd. and changed its name to Lighthouse Capital Limited in December 2018. Lighthouse Capital Limited was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Grand Baie, Mauritius.
